Author: transparent044
Text: The logical side of me knows you’re right, but that’s the equivalent of telling someone to calm down when they’re pissed. It’s so hard to put into action.   I appreciate you caring and trying to help though. Yet another reason why I love this sub.

Author: ddmar
Text: Please please please stop fasting. It's only when I stopped using compensatory behaviors that I really was able to Kickstart my recovery
